title: Behavior and Your Birth Order
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Leman and Mrs. Daly
itunes:summary:
It's common for a firstborn child to be a rule follower while younger kids tend to be more free-spirited. Yet sometimes, a child will break out of that paradigm. John asks Danny about times he's seen kids not follow the birth-order pattern. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman and Jean Daly.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Why Your Kids Misbehave--And What to Do About It" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-31?refcd=1457302

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/behavior-and-your-birth-order/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/understanding-the-root-of-your-child-s-misbehavior-digital/?refcd=1457302

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
